bill.summary: 6/3/1998--Passed House amended. John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts Authorization Act of 1998 - Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to revise the criteria for certain duties with respect to capital repair and to operation and maintenance. Repeals a requirement that the Comptroller General review and audit the Center's accounts at least once every three years. Extends through 2003 the authorization of appropriations for the Center's: (1) maintenance, security, and repair; and (2) capital projects.
